alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:12PM EDT until July 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLINTON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 511 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brainardsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Churubusco, Ellenburg Depot, Merrill, Bryants Mill, Chateaugay, Lyon Mountain, Ellenburg, Earlville, Irona, Chazy Lake, Cannon Corners, Ellenburg Mountain, Harrigan, Ellenburg Center, Owls Head, Standish, Brainardsville, Wolf Pond, and Mooers Forks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
